```{r include=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)

library(MotifBinner2)

if (!exists('result'))
{
  result <- all_results[[grep('prepConfig', names(all_results))[1]]]
}
if (class(result) != 'prepConfig')
{
  result <- all_results[[grep('prepConfig', names(all_results))[1]]]
}
```

# `r result$config$op_full_name`

Prints out the configuration that was used to run MotifBinner for this run.
